sys_ui_message.key: The Transfer Order remains in the stage "In Transit" and the quantity remaining is decreased by received quantity as not all items have been received
sys_ui_message.message: Замовлення на передачу залишається на етапі "В дорозі", а кількість, що залишилася, зменшується на отриману, оскільки передані не всі елементи
sys_ui_message.sys_name: The Transfer Order remains in the stage "In Transit" and the quantity remaining is decreased by received quantity as not all items have been received
